settings.title: My Garage Supplies B2B Program
settings.text: Are you a garage builder, home renovator, or workshop organizer? Sign up for our B2B program.

settings.title: Exclusive Pricing
settings.text: We have a tiered pricing system for our repeat business customers.

settings.title: Early Access To New Drops
settings.text: Each business account will be assigned a personal account manager.

settings.title: Early Access To New Drops
settings.text: Receive special bundle packages and new items before they are released online.

settings.title: Priority Shipping
settings.text: When your projects are on a tight schedule, you can access priority shipping lines as a business customer.

settings.heading: Get Your Personalized Bulk Order Quote Now
settings.subheading:
Get your Personalized Bulk Order Quote by using our quote form.

Here's how:

  1. Locate the Quote Form Below: You'll find it on every product page by scrolling down.
  2. Add Products as You Browse: It functions similarly to a shopping cart. Simply add items to your quote as you explore our products.
  3. Finalize Your Quote: Once you're finished, click 'Send' to submit your request.
  4. We will send a quote for you.

settings.request_button_text: Start Building Your Bulk Order Quote
